title: People are playing Taliyah in ranked today

replies.body: I'm a Taliyah and Aurelion Sol main

Well, here's the thing: I played her in a custom game mid to learn her kit, then started over and over to figure out how to jungle with her. Once I satisfied, I took her to ranked, and was 7/1/8. Had a triple kill too -- as the jungler.

So, not everyone is some stoner who needs a month to learn something as simple as a champ in League. ^^

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2191115922/228953398?tab=overview

And, I only ever got one kill on that Yasuo, by the way. He mostly fed Ahri. Sooo... :P
I'll have you know, I'm a Taliyah main!
To be fair, some, although not a lot, of people have been playing her for ~2 weeks on the PBE, so not everyone is going to be awful at her.

people try the thing once think they're good and then keep on doing it. but its not as good as they think it is.

kinda like me buying magnums.

I feel ya, bruh. All the players of Taliyah, no offense intended, suck pretty badly. I was in a normals and this taliyah, although not intentional, kept feeding brand. Thanks to the fed brand, we lost in the end. What pissed me off was she used her ult so it blocked my way. But still, taliyah either is not so hot a character or the players suck bad.
